Package Model

package Model
This package contains classes responsible for the game execution
  • Class
    Description
    Airlift
    Class containing logic for the implementation of the Airlift order
    Blockade
    Class containing logic for implementation of blockade order
    Bomb
    Class containing logic for the implementation of the Bomb order
    Continent
    The `Continent` class encapsulates information about continents, including their name, ID.
    Country
    This class represents country object that comprises of country name, continent it resides in and its neighbhouring countries.
    Deploy
    class contains the logic for the deploy order functionality
    EngineCommand
    This class contains implementation of all the actions defined by the game
    GameCard
    This class is the entity class that represents "Card" that needs to be assigned to players once they conquer any country
    GameGraph
    The GameGraph class is responsible for creating, validating and analyzing the game map.
    GamePhase
    GamePhases is an enum of the several phases that the game moves through As per the Warzone project description we have defined the phases
    GameStartPhase
    Implementation of startup phase of the game.
    GetCommands
    Provides methods to validate and retrieve user commands based on the current game phase.
    LoadGraph
    Handles loading and parsing game map data from a file.
    Order
    Command Interface used to execute the order when it is issued by the Player class.
    Player
    This class creates a Player and assigns attributes to the player.
    ReinforcePlayers
    Handles tasks related to Assign_Reinforcement Phase which assigns armies according to WarZone rules.
    TestBlockade
    Test blockade operation for a specific player in Game
    TestCard
    Test Class to checks wheteher card is getting added or not.
    TestContinent
    To test the functionalities carried out related to Continents
    TestCountry
    To test the functionalities carried out related to Country
    TestCountryAssignment
    Tests if countries are assigned properly or not
    TestMapEdit
    Test if a new map can be created or existing map can be edited.
    TestMapLoad
    Test if the map is loading or not
    TestNeighbor
    Test if neighbors are being added and removed properly or not
    TestNumberOfArmies
    Tests if Reinforcements are assigned properly or not
    TestOrderAddition
    Tests if addition of orders works
    TestOrderRemoval
    Tests if addition of orders works
    TestValidateMap
    Tests if map is validated or not
    ValidateMap
    Validation of map takes place in this class
    WargameMap
    Represents a wargame map containing continents and countries.
